title: Impact of electronic health record updates and changes on the delivery and monitoring of interventions in embedded pragmatic clinical trials
details: KA Marsolo, A Cheville, ER Melnick, JG Jarvik… - Contemporary clinical trials, 2024
abstract: Abstract The NIH Pragmatic Trials Collaboratory supports the design and conduct of 32 embedded pragmatic clinical trials, and many of these trials rely on data from the electronic health record (EHR) to monitor outcomes and/or use functionality provided …
